metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000248 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - untriaged.
metadata.Description:
Redis-store <=v1.3.0 allows unsafe objects to be loaded from redis

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000248` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-redis-store - 1.1.6-1+deb9u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-redis-store package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.6-1+deb9u1build0.16.04.1').
